be.ugent.oomo.groep12.studgent.utilities
Class LocationUtil

java.lang.Object
  be.ugent.oomo.groep12.studgent.utilities.LocationUtil

public class LocationUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that provides location-related info Contains static functions to retrieve addresses from geocode and vice versa Also implements LocationListener as intermediary to hold the last fetched location

onLocationChanged

public void onLocationChanged(Location location)
This function is called by the LocationManager when new GPS data is available. It will update the distances to every POI and QuizQuestion from the datasource and it wil also call the responding callbacks when a listener is given

Parameters:
location: - Location: The new location return : void
